subject: Football
Deaths (Obituaries)
Dementia
lead_paragraph: Mr. Perry, who was known as the “Jet” throughout his career, was one of pro football’s top runners in the decade after World War II and the first to run for 1,000 yards two N.F.L. seasons in a row.
snippet: Mr. Perry, who was known as the “Jet” throughout his career, was one of pro football’s top runners in the decade after World War II and the first to run for 1,000 yards two N.F.L. seasons in a row.
